synopsis.text: What begins as a typical summer job hunt for high school student Kouji takes an unexpected turn when he collides with Azusa, sparking an immediate mutual dislike. Fate brings them together again at Pia Carrot No. 2 Store, a family-owned restaurant where they both secure part-time positions. As Kouji navigates his new job, he finds himself constantly crossing paths with Azusa, their initial animosity gradually evolving into something more complex. Amidst the bustling restaurant and lively coworkers, Kouji embarks on a journey of self-discovery, love, and the creation of unforgettable summer memories. Will he manage to win over Azusa's heart or will their contentious relationship continue to flourish in this vibrant workplace setting? Only time will tell as these two young hearts dance around each other in the lively world of Pia Carrot.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
